text: Éverton Augusto de Barros Ribeiro (born 10 April 1989), known as Éverton Ribeiro, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder or winger for Emirati club Al-Ahli, and the Brazil national football team. Formed at Corinthians, after a loan at São Caetano he was sold to Coritiba in 2011, winning the Campeonato Paranaense in both of his seasons. He also won Série A twice at Cruzeiro, being voted the best player of each season, and joined Al- Ahli for €15 million in 2014. A full international since 2014, Ribeiro repesented Brazil at the 2015 Copa América. Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state) Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
title: Éverton Ribeiro
